name: HEARON: Locked Door
description:
This is the mini game of the game called HEARON that I developed.

Controls: W,A,D - Arrow Keys - Space

Enemies: When the little enemy hits you, you die. You can jump over it. The other enemy will follow you. To kill him you have to jump on his head.

Social: Instagram - Twitch (TR) - Discord (TR) - YouTube (TR)
